alert.note: Alert for East Carroll; Madison (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 1:59AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern East Carroll and northeastern Madison Parishes, northwestern Warren, southern Issaquena and southwestern Sharkey Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 158 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mansford, or over Tallulah, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Omega around 205 AM CDT. Eagle Bend around 215 AM CDT. Valley Park and Fitler around 225 AM CDT. Onward around 230 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Mound, Cary and Richmond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
